cast.name: 伊丽莎白·菲尔兹 Elizabeth Fields

writer.name: 伊丽莎白·菲尔兹 Elizabeth Fields

director.name: 伊丽莎白·菲尔兹 Elizabeth Fields

introduction: Miranda, a mermaid obsessed internet personality known for her quirky makeup tutorials, has placed an ad for a production assistant. Todd, the first of many to respond, has been chosen for an interview. Miranda films the interview process under the premise that she'd like her audience to connect with the person she chooses as well. During the interview, things get stranger and stranger, and the day quickly unravels into something Todd could have never expected.
